const CreateTask=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{showSuccess,showError}=useApp();const{mutate:createTask,isPending:isCreating}=useCreateTask();const[currentStep,setCurrentStep]=useState(0);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({description:'',application_type:'',tech_stack_id:'',max_depth:3,max_subtasks:10,complexity_threshold:0.7,use_context:true,requires_approval:false,tech_preferences:{frontend_framework:'',backend_language:'',database:'',additional_requirements:''}});const steps=[{id:'description',title:'Description'},{id:'tech-stack',title:'Tech Stack'},{id:'configuration',title:'Configuration'},{id:'review',title:'Review'}];const handleUpdate=updates=>{setFormData(prev=>({...prev,...updates}));};const handleNext=()=>{if(currentStep<steps.length-1){setCurrentStep(currentStep+1);}};const handlePrev=()=>{if(currentStep>0){setCurrentStep(currentStep-1);}};const handleSubmit=()=>{// Restructure data to match API expectations - move application_type and tech_stack_id into tech_preferences
const submissionData={...formData,tech_preferences:{...formData.tech_preferences,application_type:formData.application_type,tech_stack_id:formData.tech_stack_id},// Remove from top level since they should be inside tech_preferences
application_type:undefined,tech_stack_id:undefined,// Add repository information if selected
